import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Button, Card,List } from "antd" import {connect} from 'react-redux' import { LeftCircleOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons' import './css/detail.less' const {Item} = List @connect( state => ({productList:state.productList}) ) class Detail extends Component { state = { categoryId:'', desc:'', detail:'', imgs:'', name:'', price:'' } componentDidMount(){ const reduxProdList = this.props.productList const {id} = this.props.match.params reduxProdList.find((item)=>{ return item._id === id }) const {categoryId,desc,detail} = state this.setState({}) console.log(this.props.productList); } render() { return (
}> 商品名称: {this.props.match.params.id} 商品描述: XXXX 所属分类: XXXX 商品图片: XXXX 商品详情: XXXX ) } } export default Detail
